## CallInvite interface

Defines strict typings for all events emitted by [CallInvite objects](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_class.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface CallInvite 
```

## Remarks

Note that the `on` function is an alias for the `addListener` function. They share identical functionality and either may be used interchangeably.

- See also the [CallInvite class](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_class.md)<!-- -->. - See also the [CallInvite namespace](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_namespace.md)<!-- -->.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addListener(messageReceivedEvent, listener)](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_interface.addlistener_methodsignature.md) | MessageReceived event. Raised when [CallMessage](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.md) is received. |
|  [addListener(callInviteEvent, listener)](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_interface.addlistener_1_methodsignature.md) | Generic event listener typings. |
|  [on(callMessageEvent, listener)](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_interface.on_methodsignature.md) | MessageReceived event. Raised when [CallMessage](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.md) is received. |
|  [on(callInviteEvent, listener)](./voice-react-native-sdk.callinvite_interface.on_1_methodsignature.md) | Generic event listener typings. |
